forty-seven states have adopted the american bar association' s tougher rule for recusal when " impartiality might reasonably be questioned " .有四十七个州接受了美国律师公会更为严格的回避规则即“对公正存在合理怀疑”。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from Latin recusant- 'refusing', from the verb recusare (see recuse)

means.word_mean: 1. someone who refuses to conform to established standards of conduct
1. (of Catholics formerly) refusing to attend services of the Church of England

sentences.sentence: "the recusant electors...cooperated in electing a new Senate"- Mary W.Williams
